name: ListCampaignAssets
description:
Retrieve all assets of a specified type for a campaign.

This tool lists all assets of a particular type within a specified marketing campaign. It can also fetch asset metrics if start and end dates are provided, allowing for detailed analysis of campaign performance.

parameters.name: campaign_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the campaign in UUID format.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier for the campaign, formatted as a UUID.

parameters.name: asset_type
parameters.description: The type of asset to fetch for the campaign, e.g., 'email', 'webpage'.

value_schema.description: The type of asset to fetch.

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: A cursor for pagination. If provided, results start after this cursor. Example: NTI1Cg%3D%3D

value_schema.description:
A cursor for pagination. If provided, the results will start after the given cursor.
Example: NTI1Cg%3D%3D

parameters.name: maximum_results_limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of asset results to return. Default is 10.

value_schema.description:
The maximum number of results to return.
Default: 10

parameters.name: metrics_start_date
parameters.description: Start date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. Used to fetch metrics for a specified period. If not provided, no metrics will be fetched.

value_schema.description:
Start date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.

parameters.name: end_date_for_asset_metrics
parameters.description: End date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. Used for fetching metrics of assets within a specified period. Optional parameter.

value_schema.description:
End date to fetch asset metrics, formatted as YYYY-MM-DD. This date is used to fetch the metrics associated with the assets for a specified period.
If not provided, no asset metrics will be fetched.
